segments.text: Hi , Lucy . What are you going to do this weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have no idea yet . Do you have any suggestions ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you like to play tennis with me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Be sure to get to the sports hall at nine o'clock on Sunday morning .
segments.speaker: S1
